description.ru: Не снимайте гостиницу. Airbnb  - глобальная сеть жилья, сдаваемого местными жителями. Это гораздо веселее и совсем не дорого, особенно в больших городах, как Нью-Йорк, Сан-Франциско, Париж итд.
description.fr: Ne séjournez pas à l’hôtel. Airbnb est un réseau mondial d'hébergements offerts par des locaux. C'est plus sympa et très bon marché, surtout dans les grandes villes comme New York, San Francisco, Paris, etc.
description.de: Auf Airbnb kannst Du private Unterkünfte, Privatzimmer, Ferienwohnungen und Ferienhäuser weltweit günstig mieten und sicher vermieten.
description.en-US: Don't stay at a hotel. Airbnb is a global network of accommodations offered by locals. It's more fun and very cheap, especially in big cities like New York, San Francisco, Paris, etc. Unlock the doors to inspiring and unique accommodations around the world with Airbnb Mobile! Airbnb is a trusted community marketplace that connects you with people who have space for rent. The award-winning Airbnb App allows everyone to list, discover, and book any of these distinctive spaces - from a private apartment to a private island - directly from your mobile device. Features & Capabilities: • Book space directly from your phone in a few simple taps • Select “Find a place, tonight!” for last minute availability • Browse amazing Collections to see our most distinctive properties • Instantly access your upcoming itinerary, complete with directions to your destination • Message guests and hosts directly from your phone With over 150,000 listings for rent in more than 19,000 cities and 190 countries, we offer the widest variety of accommodations at any price point, anywhere. And by facilitating all bookings and financial transactions, we make filling and reserving space easy. Follow us on Twitter at http://twitter.com/airbnb Learn more about Airbnb and the Airbnb Mobile Site at http://airbnb.com/mobile
description.ko: 호텔에서 묵지 마세요. 에어비앤비는 전세계의 현지인들이 제공하는 숙소를 연결해 드립니다. 뉴욕, 샌프란시스코, 파리 등과 같은 대도시에서 특히 더 재미있고 저렴하게 여행할 수 있습니다.
description.it: Non stare in un hotel. Airbnb è una rete mondiale di alloggi offerti da persone del posto. È più divertente e molto conveniente, soprattutto nelle grandi città come New York, San Francisco, Parigi, ecc.
description.da: Prøv noget andet end hotel. Airbnb er et globalt netværk af lokale overnatningsmuligheder. Det er sjovere og billigere, især i storbyer som New York, San Francisco, Paris, etc.
description.pl: Nie korzystaj z hoteli. Airbnb to globalna sieć miejsc noclegowych oferowanych przez lokalnych mieszkańców. Takie podróżowanie jest po prostu ciekawsze i tańsze, w szczególności w dużych miastach jak Nowy Jork, San Francisco, Paryż, itd.

release_notes.en-US: Which links, specifically, redirected users out of the app? At one point, the 'Terms + Conditions' link in the footer would have done this, but this has since been rectified. There is, additionally, a "Desktop Version" link - is this the link you're speaking of? I don't believe we'll be able to remove this link.
